description: The original Lenny Face ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) is often used on boards like 4chan as sort of a replacement for the Japanese word “desu” (to be). Over time there have been many other variations made of it. You can learn more about the origins of this kaomoji on Know Your Meme. The Lenny Face has been adapted to have a whole variety of different emotions so that it can be used in virtually every situation. title: The Lenny Face
